data: `minecraft:behavior.stomp_turtle_egg` allows an entity to target and stomp on turtle eggs when detected.

data.Name: goal_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

data.Name: interval
data.Description: A random value to determine when to randomly move somewhere. This has a 1/interval chance to choose this goal

data.Name: search_height
data.Description: Height in blocks the mob will look for turtle eggs to move towards

data.Name: search_range
data.Description: The distance in blocks it will look for turtle eggs to move towards

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
